extensionDescription.message: Example WebExtension built from the example repository

buttonTitle.description: Description shown on the toolbar when hovered. DO NOT localise 'Mozilla'.

panelDefaultMessage.message: Edit an MDN document and test it against the test suite:

buttonRunTests.description: Content of the button to run the test suite

sidebar_description.message: Edit an MDN document and test it against the test suite:

run_tests.description: Label for button allowing to run the test suite

errors.description: Label for the number of errors

warnings.description: Label for the number of warnings

fix_issues.description: Label for button allowing to fix the matched errors and warnings

old_en_urls.description: Name of test checking old en/ URLs

old_en_urls_desc.message: URLs starting with /en/ are obsolete. /en-US/docs/ should be used instead.
old_en_urls_desc.description: Description of test checking for old en/ URLs

absolute_urls_for_internal_links.description: Name of test checking whether internal links contain absolute URLs

absolute_urls_for_internal_links_desc.message: Internal links should use a relative URL path instead of an absolute one.
absolute_urls_for_internal_links_desc.description: Description of test checking whether internal links contain absolute URLs

different_locale_links.description: Name of test checking whether there are any links to different locales

different_locale_links_desc.message: There should not be any links pointing to other locales.
different_locale_links_desc.description: Description of test checking whether internal links contain absolute URLs

empty_elements.description: Name of test checking for empty elements

empty_elements_desc.message:
Empty elements like e.g.

should be removed.
empty_elements_desc.description: Description of test checking for empty elements

empty_brackets.description: Name of test checking for empty brackets

empty_brackets_desc.message: Macros that don't have parameters like {{foo()}} don't need parameter list brackets. Therefore they should be removed.
empty_brackets_desc.description: Description of test checking for empty brackets

style_attributes.description: Name of test checking for 'style' HTML attributes

style_attributes_desc.message: HTML elements should not contain 'style' attributes for styling but use classes instead. So, they should be removed when possible.
style_attributes_desc.description: Description of test checking for 'style' HTML attributes

name_attributes.description: Name of test checking for 'name' HTML attributes

name_attributes_desc.message: HTML elements should not contain 'name' attributes but use ids instead. So, they should be removed.
name_attributes_desc.description: Description of test checking for 'name' HTML attributes

span_elements.description: Name of test checking for <span> elements

span_elements_desc.message:
Using elements should be avoided and other elements be used instead, e.g.

or .
span_elements_desc.description: Description of test checking for <span> elements

pre_without_class.description: Name of test checking for <pre> elements without 'class' attribute

pre_without_class_desc.message: <pre> elements must have a 'class' attribute assigned in most cases, so their syntax is highlighted.
pre_without_class_desc.description: Description of test checking for <pre> elements without 'class' attribute

summary_heading.description: Name of test checking for summary heading

summary_heading_desc.message: According to the article style guide there shouldn't be a <hx>Summary</hx> heading.
summary_heading_desc.description: Description of test checking for summary heading

example_headings.description: Name of test checking for 'Example:' headings

example_headings_desc.message:
Example headings should not include 'Example: '. E.g. instead of

Example: Foobar

just use

Foobar

.
example_headings_desc.description: Description of test checking for 'Example:' headings

alert_print_in_code.description: Name of test checking for alert(), print(), eval() and document.write() within code samples

alert_print_in_code_desc.message: Don't use alert(), print(), eval() or document.write() in code samples.
alert_print_in_code_desc.description: Description of test checking for alert(), print(), eval() and document.write() within code samples

shell_prompts.description: Name of test checking for shell prompts within code samples

shell_prompts_desc.message: Don't start shell instructions with '$' or '>'. It confuses more than it helps and causes problems when copying them.
shell_prompts_desc.description: Description of test checking for shell prompts within code samples

html_comments.description: Name of test checking for HTML comments

html_comments_desc.message: HTML comments are not visible in WYSIWYG mode and in reading mode. They are not meant to comment the documentation, so they should be removed.
html_comments_desc.description: Description of test checking for HTML comments

font_elements.description: Name of test checking for <font> elements

font_elements_desc.message: Using <font> elements is obsolete. Either the tag should be removed completely or replaced by CSS.
font_elements_desc.description: Description of test checking for <font> elements

http_links.description: Name of test checking for HTTP links

http_links_desc.message: URLs to external resources should use HTTPS instead of HTTP, when possible.
http_links_desc.description: Description of test checking for HTTP links

data_macro_note.description: Name of test checking the notes for data macros linking to the data source

data_macro_note_desc.message: Data macros need a note above them linking to the data source.
data_macro_note_desc.description: Description of test checking the notes for data macros linking to the data source

unnecessary_macro_params.description: Name of test checking for macros with unnecessary parameters

unnecessary_macro_params_desc.message: The used macro does not require any parameters, so they should be removed.
unnecessary_macro_params_desc.description: Description of test checking for macros with unnecessary parameters

macro_syntax_error.description: Name of test checking for macro syntax errors

macro_syntax_error_desc.message: A macro has a syntax error like a missing closing bracket, e.g. {{jsxref('Array'}}.
macro_syntax_error_desc.description: Description of test checking for macro syntax errors

invalid_macros.description: Name of test checking for invalid macros

invalid_macros_desc.message: The used macro is not allowed or does not exist
invalid_macros_desc.description: Description of test checking for invalid macros

incorrectly_wrapped_sidebar_macros.description: Name of test checking incorrectly wrapped sidebar macros

incorrectly_wrapped_sidebar_macros_desc.message: Sidebar macros must be wrapped into <div> elements
incorrectly_wrapped_sidebar_macros_desc.description: Description of test checking incorrectly wrapped sidebar macros

wrong_highlighted_line.description: Name of test checking for wrong highlighted line within code samples

wrong_highlighted_line_desc.message: A code block has a line highlighted that is outside the range of code lines.
wrong_highlighted_line_desc.description: Description of test checking for wrong highlighted line within code samples

api_syntax_headlines.description: Name of test checking the order and names of API syntax headlines

api_syntax_headlines_desc.message: API syntax headlines must be 'Parameters', 'Return value' and 'Exceptions', in that order, not 'Returns', 'Errors' or 'Errors thrown'.
api_syntax_headlines_desc.description: Description of test checking the order and names of API syntax headlines

code_in_pre.description: Name of test checking whether there are <code> tags within <pre> blocks

code_in_pre_desc.message: <code> tags should not be used within <pre> blocks, because they break syntax highlighting.
code_in_pre_desc.description: Description of test checking whether there are <code> tags within <pre> blocks

pre_line_too_long.description: Name of test checking whether there are too long lines within <pre> blocks

pre_line_too_long_desc.message: To avoid horizontal scrollbars, there should be maximal 77 characters per line in <pre> blocks.
pre_line_too_long_desc.description: Description of test checking whether there are too long lines within <pre> blocks

wrong_syntax_class.description: Name of test checking whether the CSS class for the syntax definition block is correct

wrong_syntax_class_desc.message: The CSS class used for the syntax definition block must be 'syntaxbox'.
wrong_syntax_class_desc.description: Description of test checking whether the CSS class for the syntax definition block is correct

url_in_link_title.description: Name of test checking whether there is a URL within the 'title' attribute of a link

url_in_link_title_desc.message: The URL of a link is already shown on hover, so repeating it within its 'title' attribute is redundant and should be avoided.
url_in_link_title_desc.description: Description of test checking whether there is a URL within the 'title' attribute of a link

article_length.description: Name of test checking the length of the article

article_length_desc.message: Hints regarding the length of the article.
article_length_desc.description: Description of test checking the length of the article

link_using_wrong_locale.description: Error message for link using wrong locale

data_macro_note_missing.message: The data macro %s is missing a note linking to the data source. The note needs to be hidden using 'class="hidden"'.
data_macro_note_missing.description: Error message for data macro missing a note above it linking to the data source

data_macro_source_link_missing.message: The note for the data macro %s is missing a link to the data source.
data_macro_source_link_missing.description: Error message for data macro note missing a link referring to the data source

macro_with_unnecessary_params_equalling_.message: The parameters of the %s macro are unnecessary, because they will be fetched from the slug, so they should be removed.
macro_with_unnecessary_params_equalling_.description: Error message for macro with unnecessary parameters equalling slug

macro_with_unused_params.message: The parameters of the %s macro are unused, so they should be removed.
macro_with_unused_params.description: Error message for macro with unused parameters

missing_closing_curly_brace.message: Macro is missing a closing curly brace: %s
missing_closing_curly_brace.description: Error message for macro missing closing curly brace

missing_closing_bracket.message: Parameters list is missing closing bracket: %s
missing_closing_bracket.description: Error message for macro missing a closing bracket

string_parameter_incorrectly_quoted.message: String parameter is not quoted correctly: %s
string_parameter_incorrectly_quoted.description: Error message for macro string parameter not being quoted correctly

additional_closing_bracket.description: Error message for macro having additional closing brackets

wrong_element_wrapping_sidebar_macro.message: Sidebar macro %s is wrapped into <%s> element
wrong_element_wrapping_sidebar_macro.description: Error message for sidebar macro wrapped into wrong element

obsolete_macro.message: The %s macro is obsolete and should be removed.

highlighted_line_number_not_positive.message: Highlighted line number %s must be positive: %s
highlighted_line_number_not_positive.description: Error message for highlighted line number being zero or negative

highlighted_line_number_too_big.message: Highlighted line number %s exceeds the line count of %s: %s
highlighted_line_number_too_big.description: Error message for highlighted line number exceeding the line count of the code sample

invalid_highlighted_range.message: End of highlighted line range %s bigger than its start %s: %s
invalid_highlighted_range.description: Error message for highlighted line number range being invalid (start of range bigger than end of range)

invalid_headline_name.description: Error message for invalid headline name

invalid_headline_order.description: Error message for invalid headline order

wrong_syntax_class_used.message: The CSS class '%s' used for the syntax definition block is wrong. It must be 'syntaxbox'.
wrong_syntax_class_used.description: Error message for invalid CSS class for the syntax definition block

article_length_info.message: The article has %s words. Estimated read time: %s minute(s).
article_length_info.description: Info message for article length and reading time estimation

long_article.message: The article is very long. Consider to split it up into smaller articles.

autoExpandErrors_title.description: Title of 'autoExpandErrors' property (shown in Add-ons Manager)

autoExpandErrors_description.message: Immediately display errors and warnings returned by a test when running the test suite.
autoExpandErrors_description.description: Description of 'autoExpandErrors' property (shown in Add-ons Manager)

link_count_desc.message: Number of links in the document

count_link_info.description: Informations when there are less than 100 links

count_link_warning.message: There should be less than 100 links, currently: %s
count_link_warning.description: Warning regarding the number of links

count_link_error.message: There should be less than 250 links and ideally less than 100 links, currently: %s
count_link_error.description: Error regarding the number of links
